paragraph: Phillip Bent (born 16 September 1964) is an English jazz flautist from London, England, who was a member of the GRP All-Star Big Band. He has made references to a number of musicians as his inspiration, including Bobbi Humphrey, James Newton, Kathryn Lukas (his teacher), William Bennett, and James Galway.
Dave Grusin Presents GRP All-Star Big Band Live! (1993)
Jazz Warriors, Out of Many, One People (1987)
Galliano,  A Joyful Noise Unto The Creator (1992)
The Prodigy, Music For The Jilted Generation, 3 Kilos ( 1994 )
